alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Petroleum; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 27 at 2:08AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Daniels, Dawson, Eastern Roosevelt, Garfield, McCone, Northern Phillips, Northern Valley, Petroleum, Prairie, Richland, Sheridan, Southwest Phillips, Western Roosevelt and Wibaux. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - More showers and thunderstorms are expected through Saturday night. Any storms remaining over the same area for a long time may lead to flooding as they will likely contain heavy rain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Petroleum; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux
